morningBrief.body: 116/123 trails spinning, 66 freshly groomed. Snow Wind. 9 runs freshly groomed, mostly in Lower Mountain and Upper Mountain. Winter flexing today: snow and wind in the forecast. Dress for it.

morningBrief.headline: Active Weather Today
morningBrief.body: 112 trails open, 56 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. Storm mode engaged. Expect snow and wind, especially at higher elevations.

morningBrief.headline: Fewer Crowds, More Turns
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 7" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore.

morningBrief.headline: 1" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: Overnight dusting of 1" means the hardpack got a makeover. Nearly full mountain access with 64 of 64 trails spinning. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: The Base Is Holding Up
morningBrief.body: Holding steady - that 13" base from recent storms is doing the heavy lifting. 5 runs freshly groomed, mostly in Mt. Mansfield - FourRunner and Mt. Mansfield - Gondola. Lift lines were mellow yesterday. Expect a similar vibe today.
